sub_title: Building Climate Resilient Cities at Wavin Group
summary:
I am engaged to safeguard our planet as a safe, healthy and attractive place for my children and generations to come. My drive is to link water management to broader trends and challenges to build climate resilient environments.

Areas of expertise: 
Plastic water management systems
Consultancy water and spatial planning
Urban and rural water management
Project management
Sanitation
Supervision of construction work
Civil engineering
Hydraulic and hydrologic models 
Capacity building
